version_description:
New year, new release!

We’ve added some neat new features to let you manage your card straight from the business app. With just a couple of taps, you can:

* View your card details (e.g. card number, CVV, etc)
* Check and unblock your PIN code
* Freeze or unfreeze your card if you misplace it

We’ve also upgraded our security with 2 factor authentication. From now on, when you’re doing important things like changing your passcode, we’ll send you an SMS to your registered phone to verify your identity.

Oh, and you’ll also be able to open the app with your fingerprint or Face ID. Pretty smooth, right?

We’ve also upgraded our security with 2 factor authentication. From now on, when you’re doing important things like changing your passcode, we’ll send you an SMS to your registered phone to verify your identity.

Oh, and you’ll also be able to open the app with your fingerprint or Face ID. Pretty smooth, right?

Welcome! With the updated app you can: report your card as lost or stolen, view and edit your user profile, and enable or disable Touch ID/Face ID. Plus, you can change your app passcode, and log out via the app.

Say hello to our Help Center. You can now search our comprehensive FAQ for any issues on your app, as well as get fast access to our community and blog.

We’re working to bring our Support chat to the business app as well, so stay tuned!

Here's what you can expect in this update of Revolut for Business:
* Business admins can now log in and view their account in the app
* Business admins will be able to view account details, balances and observe transaction statuses
* Card holders will now also see when any of their expenses have been rejected and require a refund.

We're working hard to ensure you have full functionality in your app so stay tuned for more updates.

Besides improving the performance of your app (and optimizing for iOS 13), read on to find out what to expect in this update of the Revolut for Business app:

* You can now send money in your app. Select a currency, key in the amount and send money to any counterparty that you've previously saved on your web dashboard
* Also - you'll now be able to exchange up to 28 currencies!

Stay tuned for more improvements in the next update!

New year, new release! We’re not the type to ease into things, so we’re starting off 2020 with some features that’ll help you meet your New Year’s resolutions!
Connect more: We’re introducing 24/7 in-app support! You can chat with our customer support staff directly from the Help section.
Travel more: You can now view exchange rates for different currencies and check how they’ve been trending throughout a specific time period.
Get more done: We understand the importance of getting things done fast, so we’ve made performance improvements to enhance loading speed.
Get excited for even more great new features and releases in the coming months.

It’s never too early to start your spring cleaning! With this release, we’re introducing new payments and dashboard section to keep things neat and tidy, and to ensure everything in the app sparks joy for your business. With this new streamlined dashboard, you can quickly find and manage your accounts, cards, currency watchlists and more all from a centralised location.
And, while we were at it, we’ve been hard at work on the usual bug fixes. Not today, bugs. Not today.

Who’s that card behind the mask? With our latest release, it’s your card details!
We know how important it is to protect and respect your personal data, so in this release, we’re masking card details from prying eyes. Simply tap on the card to reveal its details.
You can also view our Privacy policy statement from the Settings section.
We’ve also introduced the ability to download your account and transaction statements.

We’ve given the mobile cards section a facelift, so it’s easier than ever to connect your cards to Apple Pay.
We’ve rolled out 8 new languages. So you can say “hola” to a newly localised Revolut Business.
Open Banking has arrived. You can now connect Revolut to your external bank accounts for even better visibility over your cash flow.
And, as always, we’ve fixed a few bugs. Though we still recommend regular hand washing to keep the bugs at bay.

Check out our new look! We’re rolling out our app redesign, starting with the new Revolut Business logo, updated fonts and colours, plus an updated UI for our Accounts, Cards, Payments and Settings features. This is only phase one, so expect an even slicker app coming soon.

On top of that, we've added a few helpful features:

● Activate your new card more securely by using the card PIN for your first in-store payment
● Merchant accounts are now enabled for businesses invited to our beta launch. Capture, cancel, or refund customer payments with ease

Welcome to Revolut Business 2.0. One app to manage all your business finances. Powerful tools you know and love, plus a whole lot more, right at your fingertips.


What’s new?

● An improved look and interface - it’s pretty slick, even if we do say so ourselves
● We’ve added Open Banking! Connect your bank accounts to the Revolut Business app for even better visibility over your cash flow (only available in the UK - but we’re working hard on making it available elsewhere!)
● What’s more, you can now manage your card settings on the app too, so you have more control while you’re on the go!

Welcome to Revolut Business 2.0. One app to manage all your business finances. Powerful tools you know and love, plus a whole lot more, right at your fingertips.


What’s new?

● An improved look and interface - it’s pretty slick, even if we do say so ourselves
● We’ve added Open Banking! Connect your bank accounts to the Revolut Business app for even better visibility over your cash flow (only available in the UK - but we’re working hard on making it available elsewhere!)
● What’s more, you can now manage your card settings on the app too, so you have more control while you’re on the go!

Our work continues on bringing you one app to manage all your business finances. We’ve got some cool new features, and a few extra fixes and tweaks to keep things running smoothly.
• More control for your business - track how much you’ve received or spent each day with daily totals
• We’ve extended the card setting options so you can manage your card on the go!
• Connect Revolut Business to your other banks by securely providing access directly within the mobile app
• Get paid quicker on your merchant account - you can now generate a payment request as a url link and send it to your customers

We’ve added two new features designed to make your Revolut Business experience better than ever.
• Keep track of your payments – you can now see your payments history for a specific counterparty
• If you need to log in or reset your password on the web app, you can now simply tap the push notification on your mobile to confirm the authentication request. No more waiting on email or SMS.
• Plus, we’ve done a regular tune-up and polished the app to keep it running smoothly

We’ve introduced instant Euro transfers. Now, when you send or receive a EUR transfer from your Revolut Business account to another bank account in Europe, the money will arrive within seconds, as long as the other bank accepts Instant transfers.

We’ve introduced instant Euro transfers. Now, when you send or receive a EUR transfer from your Revolut Business account to another bank account in Europe, the money will arrive within seconds, as long as the other bank accepts Instant transfers.

We’ve introduced instant Euro transfers. Now, when you send or receive a EUR transfer from your Revolut Business account to another bank account in Europe, the money will arrive within seconds, as long as the other bank accepts Instant transfers.

Get exclusive offers from top brands – now straight from the Revolut Business app. Enjoy discounts on a range of products and services from Apple, Google, Samsung, Deliveroo, Hiscox, Adzooma and more.

With this release, we’re bringing you some new features to make managing your business expenses even easier:

• All of your payments are now captured within Expenses. Easily attach receipts and categorise card and bank payments in one place.
• You can now see the grand total that you have spent this month on expenses.
• General bug fixes & improvements

• All of your payments are now captured within Expenses. Easily attach receipts and categorise card and bank payments in one place.
• You can now see the grand total that you have spent this month on expenses.
• General bug fixes & improvements
